Name: Baseball
Description: Used to recruit Players. The cost is reasonable.

Name: Game Ball
Description: Regulation Game balls perform better than cheap balls.

Name: Series Ball
Description: Post-season Series balls perform better than a Game Ball.

Name: Park Ball
Description: This special ball is for recruiting Players in Strike Zone.

Name: Signed Ball
Description: This ball can recruit Players 100% of the time.

Name: X-Bat
Description: Available only in games, batting ability will increase.

Name: X-Field
Description: Available only in games, field ability will increase.

Name: X-Speed
Description: Available only in games, speed will increase.

Name: X-Throw
Description: In a game, throwing ability will increase.

Name: Guard Spec.
Description: In a game, the opposing Player can’t use special abilities.

Name: Dire Hit
Description: In a game, your swings will be more effective.

Name: X-Accuracy
Description: In a game, your pitching accuracy will increase.

Name: X-Contact
Description: In a game, your hitting contact will increase.

Name: Cutout
Description: A cardboard cutout of a Player. Try using it in a game.

Name: Steroids
Description: Increases Player’s level by 1.

Name: HGH
Description: HP level will increase.

Name: Protein
Description: Batting ability points will increase.

Name: Iron
Description: Fielding ability points will increase.

Name: Carbos
Description: Speed points will increase.

Name: Calcium
Description: Throwing ability points will increase.

Name: PP Up
Description: PP level will increase.

Name: Nugget
Description: This item is not very effective unless you’re after gold.

Name: Helix Jersey
Description: You will need to find the secret of this item.

Name: Dome Helmet
Description: You will need to find the secret of this item.

Name: Old Hat
Description: You will need to find the secret of this item.

Name: Town Map
Description: This map will help you navigate the world of Baseball.

Name: Gold Teeth
Description: These belong to the warden of Strike Zone.

Name: S.S. Ticket
Description: A boarding ticket for the S.S. Manny.

Name: Dream Scope
Description: This allows you to identify a ghostly Player.

Name: Harmonica
Description: It wakes up sleeping Players. It’s handy during games.

Name: Old Rod
Description: Use this rod to fish with water Players.

Name: Good Rod
Description: This rod can recruit Players that the OLD ROD can’t.

Name: Super Rod
Description: The best rod. It recruits Players that the other rods can’t.

Name: Itemfinder
Description: This handy machine helps you find items.

Name: Exp. All
Description: Share experience with Players who didn’t play.

Name: Token Case
Description: Save a maximum of 9,999 tokens in this.

Name: Fire Glove
Description: This glove has a connection to Fire Players.

Name: Spark Glove
Description: This glove has a connection to Electric Players.

Name: Water Glove
Description: This glove has a connection to Water Players.

Name: Leaf Glove
Description: This glove has a connection to Grass Players.

Name: Moon Glove
Description: This glove has a connection to ? Players.

Name: Antidote
Description: This removes poison from a Player

Name: Burn Heal
Description: This heals a Player that is burned.

Name: Ice Heal
Description: Thaws a frozen Player.

Name: Awakening
Description: This wakes up a sleeping Player.

Name: Parlyz Heal
Description: This heals a paralyzed Player.

Name: Full Heal
Description: This will heal all of the conditions stated above.

Name: Potion
Description: This will restore some HP.

Name: Super Potion
Description: This will restore more HP than a POTION.

Name: Hyper Potion
Description: This will restore more HP than a SUPER POTION.

Name: Max Potion
Description: This restores HP to its maximum.

Name: Full Restore
Description: This will heal all conditions and fully restore HP.

Name: Revive
Description: This will revive an exhausted Player and restore ½ HP.

Name: Max Revive
Description: This will revive an exhausted Player and fully restore HP.

Name: Water
Description: During a game, it will restore HP a little.

Name: Beer
Description: During a game, it will restore HP a lot.

Name: Sport-Ade
Description: During a game, it will restore HP a lot more.

Name: Bicycle
Description: This is too expensive for a child to buy.

Name: Escape Rope
Description: This rope can pull you out of a cave instantly.

Name: Repel
Description: Spray on and weak Players will avoid you for a while.

Name: Super Repel
Description: This spray lasts longer than REPEL.

Name: Max Repel
Description: This spray lasts longer than SUPER REPEL.
